DOC.brief_summary: Using randomized clinical trial ( RCT ) , study design assess effectiveness HIV ( human immunodeficiency virus ) risk-reduction intervention target injection drug user ( IDUs ) three Ukraine oblasts ( region ) . The investigator propose compare effectiveness revise updated manually-driven HIV test counsel intervention , Counseling Education ( C & E ) model develop NIDA , C & E plus manualized network intervention . At site , Odessa , Donetsk Nikolayev , 250 `` index member '' 500 network member recruit street outreach 32-month period randomly assign C & E alone C & E plus network intervention . Participants test drug metabolite , interview use ACASI ( Audio Computer-Assisted Self-Interviewing ) , give rapid test HIV baseline , 6 12-months . At six-months , network member ask recruit two others inject study . Primary outcome include knowledge , self-efficacy , injection sex-related risk behavior reduction partner disclosure among indexes primary secondary network member intervention diffusion secondary network member . The investigator hypothesize positive significant change , include injection sex risk reduction , intervention diffusion , partner disclosure , among index well first second network member network plus C & E arm compare C & E alone . Specific aim include : 1 . To compare effectiveness C & E alone additive effect network intervention plus C & E increase knowledge HIV increase self-efficacy practice safer injection sex-related behavior among index , primary secondary network member . 2 . To assess effectiveness C & E alone additive effect network intervention plus C & E reduce drug sex risk behavior among index , primary secondary network member . 3 . To compare extent intervention diffusion second wave network member two arm . 4 . To evaluate extent disclosure HIV positive index network member two arm
